reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: Improving access to HIV and TB testing and treatment for key and at risk populations in Mali

description.narrative: Mali - TB/HIV - Association pour Résilience des Communautés vers l’Accès au Développement et à la Santé Plus - ARCAD Santé PLUS. This program has the following goals: TB : Réduire l’incidence liée au TB de 30% d’ici 2025 (par rapport à l’année 2018)/ TB: Reduce TB incidence by 30% by 2025 (compared to 2018). TB : Réduire la mortalité et la morbidité liées au TB de 50% d’ici 2025 (par rapport à l’année 2018)/ Reduce TB mortality and morbidity by 50% by 2025 (compared to 2018). VIH : Réduire l’incidence liée au VIH de 50% d’ici 2025 (par rapport à l’année 2019)/HIV: Reduce HIV-related incidence by 50% by 2025 (compared to 2019). VIH : Réduire la mortalité et la morbidité liées au VIH de 50% d’ici 2025 (par rapport à l’année 2019)/HIV: Reduce HIV-related mortality and morbidity by 50% by 2025 (compared to 2019). VIH/TB : Les principes de droits humains et d’égalité femmes-hommes sont mis en œuvre dans le cadre du plan intégré d'ici 2023/HIV / TB: The principles of human rights and gender equality are implemented in the framework of the integrated plan by 2023. VIH/TB : La gouvernance de la riposte nationale aux VIH, TB et hépatites virales est intégrée, efficiente et performante d’ici 2023 /HIV / TB: the governance of the national response to HIV, TB and viral hepatitis is integrated, efficient and effective by 2023. The objectives of this program are: TB : Au moins 90% des cas de TB attendus sont notifiés d’ici 2025/ TB: At least 90% of expected TB cases are notified by 2025. TB : 48% des cas attendus de TB bactériologiquement confirmés, résistants aux médicaments TB-RR et/ou TB-MR sont mis sous traitement d'ici 2023/TB: 48% of expected cases of bacteriologically confirmed TB, resistant to TB-RR drugs and / or MDR-TB are started on treatment by 2023. TB : 90% des cas de co-infection TB/VIH toutes formes (nouveaux cas + rechutes) sont traitées avec succès d'ici 2023/TB: 90% of all forms of TB / HIV co-infection (new cases + relapses) are successfully treated by 2023. VIH : En 2025, 50% des adolescent(e)s et jeunes âgés de 10 à 24 ans et des populations vulnérables disposent de compétences adaptées pour se protéger du VIH et des IST par une approche différenciée de prévention et de dépistage selon l’âge et le sexe/HIV: In 2025, 50% of adolescents and young people aged 10 to 24 and vulnerable populations have the appropriate skills to protect themselves from HIV and STIs thanks to an approach to prevention and screening differentiated by age and sex. VIH : 95% des adolescent(e)s et les femmes enceintes de 15 à 49 ans connaissent leur statut sérologique pour le VIH et bénéficient du paquet minimum de prévention VIH dès l’entrée en CPN d'ici 2023/HIV: 95% of adolescents and pregnant women aged 15 to 49 know their HIV status and benefit from the minimum HIV prevention package upon entering ANC by 2023. VIH : 95% des populations clés et vulnérables (PS, HSH, UDI et transgenre) utilisent le paquet de services de prévention combinée selon des approches différenciées d'ici 2023./HIV: 95% of key and vulnerable populations SW, MSM, IDU and transgender) use the package of combined prevention services according to a differentiated approach by 2023.. VIH : 95% des PVVIH femmes et hommes connaissant leur statut reçoivent un traitement antirétroviral/HIV: 95% of PLWHIV, both women and men, who know their status receive antiretroviral therapy. VIH/TB : D'ici 2025, l’environnement social et juridique protège les personnes touchées par le VIH/TB/HV et les populations vulnérables contre la stigmatisation et la discrimination / HIV/TB: By 2025, the social and legal environment protects people affected by HIV/TB/HIV and vulnerable populations from stigma and discrimination. VIH/TB : La coordination, le leadership, le suivi-évaluation des activités et la recherche sont assurés à travers des études pour le VIH/Sida et la Tuberculose pour l’atteinte des résultats du PSNI d'ici 2023/HIV / TB: the coordination, leadership, monitoring and evaluation of activities and research are ensured by studies on HIV / AIDS and Tuberculosis to achieve the results set by the Integrated Natinal Strategic Programme by 2023

title.narrative: Coverage / Output indicator for MLI-C-ARC
Percentage of men who have sex with men that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of sex workers reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
HTS-5-Other2 Percentage of MSM newly diagnosed with HIV initiated on ART
HTS-5-Other1 Percentage of sex workers newly diagnosed with HIV initiated on ART
Percentage of men who have sex with men reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Number of notified TB cases (all forms) contributed by non-national TB program providers – community referrals
Percentage of transgender people that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of sex workers that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of people who inject drugs reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Number of TB cases (all forms) notified among prisoners
Percentage of people who inject drugs that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Number of people in prisons or other closed settings that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of other vulnerable populations that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Impact indicator for MLI-C-ARC
Number of new HIV infections per 1000 uninfected population
Estimated percentage of children newly infected with HIV from mother-to-child transmission among women living with HIV delivering in the past 12 months
Percentage of men who have sex with men who are living with HIV
TB incidence rate per 100,000 population
TB mortality rate per 100,000 population
Number of AIDS-related deaths per 100,000 population
Percentage of people who inject drugs who are living with HIV
Percentage of sex workers who are living with HIV
Outcome indicator for MLI-C-ARC
Percentage of people living with HIV and on ART who are virologically suppressed
Treatment success rate of all forms of TB - bacteriologically confirmed plus clinically diagnosed, new and relapse cases

TB treatment coverage: Percentage of new and relapse cases that were notified and treated among the estimated number of incident TB cases in the same year (all form of TB - bacteriologically confirmed plus clinically diagnosed)
Percentage of sex workers reporting the use of a condom with their most recent client

Percentage of people living with HIV not on ART at the end of the reporting period among people living with HIV who were either on ART at the end of the last reporting period or newly initiated on ART during the reporting period
Percentage of men reporting the use of a condom the last time they had anal sex with a non regular partner
Percentage of people who inject drugs reporting the use of sterile injecting equipment the last time they injected
